original_title: テレビ放送できなかった禁断映像1
overview: Shocking content that cannot be broadcast on TV! A shelved tape that would never be made public was leaked as a "debt collection record"! While covering the reality of wiretapping, I happened to come across a prostitution scene in the entertainment world! Shocked by the astonishing request! Is there such a person? A human horror so gruesome that a ghost would be better!
title: Forbidden Video That Could Not be Broadcast on TV
